description: GET Budget Pools for Single or multiple Organizations by Comp Review Event and Supervisory                  Organizations with or without including subordinate Organizations and or by Compensation                  Plan Type
Returns Compensation Review Participation Rule Sets by Reference ID, or returns all                  Compensation Review Participation Rule Sets if no Reference ID is provided
Get Employee Awards for a specific employee by Position or all employees within a                  Supervisory Organization in the context of a Compensation Review Process

GET Import Comp Review Budget Pools for Single or multiple Organizations by Comp Review                  Event and Organization with or without including subordinate Organizations and or                  by Compensation Plan Type for use on compensation review processes after WD29
This operation updates budget pool, holdback, and reserve information for all Supervisory                  Organizations in processes launched after Workday 29.
This operation updates Employee Awards for a specific employee or employees in the                  specified organization for the Compensation Review Process
Add or change a deferred bonus calculation.
